text:
John Leslie Stuart MacFarlane (26 March 1919 – 15 January 1986) was an Australian politician. He was a member of the Country Liberal Party. He served as a member of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly for Elsey from 1974 to 1983. He was also the assembly's speaker from 1975 to 1984.
MacFarlane was born in Sydney, New South Wales. On 15 January 1986, MacFarlane died at the age of 66.
